data.description:
"To all who come to this Place of Joy, Hope and Friendship - Welcome"

Do you love Epcot? Do you love the classic Epcot Center icons? Do you love your Pebble? My answer - who doesn't!?

This is a simple watchface that displays the time, date, and current weather conditions in Fahrenheit with a changing background of the classic Epcot Center attraction icons.

Enjoy!

data.description:
>>> Check out the new watchface "Color weather Plus" with step count, battery, date styles, and custom weather colors!

COLOR WEATHER
No weather icon, the weather condition is represented by a unique 2 colors combination: one for sky and the other for ambient.

AMBIENT
+Day: light blue
+Night: dark blue
+Overcast: gray
+Rain: cyan
+Snow: white
+Fog: gray

SKY
+Sun: orange
+Moon: yellow
+Clouds: white
+Rain: gray
+Thunders: purple

- Setting: Weather temperature units (C, F, K)
- Setting: Vibes on phone disconnect
- Show day of week (spanish or english)
- Setting: Multiple font styles:
  + Thick (original watchface design)
  + Slim

LAYOUT FOR THE PEBBLE CLASSIC (B/W)
AMBIENT
+Day: white
+Night: black

SKY
+No weather condition alert (clear, partly cloudly): the same color as ambient
+Weather condition alert (overcast, rain, thunder, snow, fog): inverse color to the ambient


This dynamic color scheme is also available as a theme in my following watchfaces:
- STRAIGHT
- ASCII WEATHER
- TIMESTAMP
data.title: COLOR Weather

data.author: Nate Scribano

changelog.release_notes:
- NEW thin TOP logo option!
- Time, date, day of week, and lyrics colors are now customizable
- New settings page
- Made date/day of week text a little larger
- More lyrics added
- Finally made BW Pebble background cleaner
- Centered the time within the old logo

- Added support for Pebble Time Round
- Fixed issues that caused lyrics to change too often
- Disabled the change of logo image when lyrics change on Pebble Classic
- Changed background on BW pebble when lyrics are disabled
- Accidentally disabled watch capability on previous release

- Added ability to turn on/off lyrics by using configuration button in Pebble app
- Added day of the week above date
- Slight alignment/text adjustments
- A month's worth (31) of lyrics are now in the watch face
- Removed AM/PM label due to text overlap with the time

- Cleaned up "rough edges" on logo image so it looks nicer
- Added more song quotes

Now the time, date, day of week, and lyrics colors are all customizable. Also, switch between the original logo and the new thin logo from the settings.

data.author: dezign999
data.description:
t999 is a minimal, yet stylish, watch face designed to compliment your custom watch straps, skins and clothes. Customize your watch face to match your own personal style or mood.

t999 Features:

• Configurable Background Color
• Configurable Day & Month Color
• Optional Weather in ºC or ºF (openweathermaps.org)
• Optional Weather refresh interval

Location is acquired by your phone automatically.  The time, date, weather and weather icon are not configurable, but will automatically change from White to Black based on background color of choice.

Happy customizing!

data.author: coreyonfire

changelog.release_notes:
Bug fixes!
- NO MORE EXPLODING FISH TANKS: the watch face will no longer crash when you press buttons on your pebble. Sorry about that guys! I didn't have a real hardware pebble to test on until today.

New features!
- SLOW DOWN THERE LIL' BUDDY: you can now choose how lazy the fish are in the brand spankin' new settings panel. Lazier fish don't swim around as often.
- LOOKED KINDA FISHY: time font has been changed to Montserrat. I was informed that the previous font, HANG THE DJ, was garish and tacky. 

Coming soon!
- SPECIAL SNOWFLAKES: not all fish are the same. different fish coming soon!
- THIS TANK MIGHT BE BIG ENOUGH FOR THE BOTH OF US: three fish is cool, but what about custom number of fish?

v1.0 release!

Resolved Issues:
 - Custom time font was unloading, this has been resolved. Custom font should remain loaded.
 - Fish no longer die. Fish were previously dying because I was infinitely allocating/birthing new fish. There will only be three fish in the tank from now on, no more over crowding.

Working on:
 - New fish sprite
 - New fish types, ability to change fish types (don't like goldfish? you'll get koi! or tuna! or maybe even a boot)

data.description: Simple watchface that's designed to look like a fishtank. You can configure the number of goldfish swimming around as well as how fast they swim.

latest_release.release_notes:
Bug fixes!
- NO MORE EXPLODING FISH TANKS: the watch face will no longer crash when you press buttons on your pebble. Sorry about that guys! I didn't have a real hardware pebble to test on until today.

New features!
- SLOW DOWN THERE LIL' BUDDY: you can now choose how lazy the fish are in the brand spankin' new settings panel. Lazier fish don't swim around as often.
- LOOKED KINDA FISHY: time font has been changed to Montserrat. I was informed that the previous font, HANG THE DJ, was garish and tacky. 

Coming soon!
- SPECIAL SNOWFLAKES: not all fish are the same. different fish coming soon!
- THIS TANK MIGHT BE BIG ENOUGH FOR THE BOTH OF US: three fish is cool, but what about custom number of fish?

data.title: FishTank

data.author: Ben Combee (@unwiredben)

changelog.release_notes: Fixed bug where four digit times wouldn't show

Version 1.4 switches to SDK 4, uses Clay for the configuration page (no more server!), supports custom colors, Bluetooth disconnection vibration, and changing display during quick view. It also switches the font to Ubuntu Mono so we can show the ohm symbol.
Add support for the Pebble Time Round platform
Fix config screen to restore previous setting when opened, update to use Pebble's Slate framework
First public release via Pebble App Store

data.description:
Are you an electrical engineer or a electronics hobbyist?  Need some training in recognizing resistor color codes?  Resistor Time is the answer, showing the current time and date via the magic of resistor color codes.  The resistance value (and also 24-hour time) is included at the bottom of the screen, while the part number silkscreen updates for the current day and month.

You can configure the watchface colors from a set of preset choices or custom foreground and background colors, and you can enable vibration when the BlueTooth connection to the phone goes away or returns.

latest_release.release_notes: Fixed bug where four digit times wouldn't show

data.title: Resistor Time

data.description:
Hex-An reimagines the traditional analog clock for the versatile display of the Pebble Time and Pebble Time Steel. Inspired by LED watches produced by Kisai / TokyoFlash.com, this watchface consists of digital segments arranged in a hexagonal form.

The time is read in the same manner as a conventional analog clock. Additionally, an AM/PM indicator occupies the centre, pointing up for AM and down for PM.

This watchface can be configured to show the date, as well as toggle the animation that is triggered on every minute transition.

Also available for original Pebble and Pebble Steel smartwatches.

latest_release.release_notes: Resolved issues causing crashes on Pebble Time; Added icon for the Watchfaces menu.

Hourly forecast 2 is a UI remix from Hourly forecast!

data.description:
Hourly forecast 2 is a UI remix from Hourly forecast!

It is  designed for daylong outdoor activities like Randonneuring!

Features:
-Shows temperatures, conditions, wind speeds and directions in coming 6 hours.
-Current temperature, relative humidity, wind speed and gust wind info and condition.
-Current location and updated time.
-Cached data for 36hrs, no need to wait for loading every time!
-Black or white colour schemes!

Thanks for:
https://github.com/erikflowers/weather-icons for nice icon!

https://github.com/cynorg/PebbleTimely for nice example how to create an informative watch face!

TTF editor for icon font: 
https://icomoon.io

GIF editor for screenshots:
http://gifmaker.me/
data.title: Hourly forecast 2

data.author: Alex Wiebe

changelog.release_notes: Fixed bug where warnings don't clear properly.

Cache weather locally.
Clean up code (use COLOR_FALLBACK macro).
Fixed up notification messages and some colours.

Expanded list of cities that can be selected.
Config/setting page will default to Winnipeg. And it will not remember your selection if you change it (sorry).

Version 0.3
Bug fixes to storing settings.

data.description:
(Warning: Very beta - testing only) Retrieves weather from Environment Canada's open data portal. English or French sky conditions can be selected. A limited number of (randomly) selected cities are available to choose from. Default city is Winnipeg, MB.

Email me to have your favourite Canadian city added!

Any weather warnings issued for the selected city will result in watch vibrating and summary text being displayed at the bottom.

Wxx% is watch battery strength.
+++ / - - is Bluetooth connection. Watch will vibrate once / minute if bluetooth connection is down.

latest_release.release_notes: Fixed bug where warnings don't clear properly.

data.title: Canadian Weather Watchface

data.author: David Filskov
data.description:
Tap MORE FROM THIS DEVELOPER to check out the NEW version.

It's invertible - and in color.

This version (V2) won't be updated.
data.title: Quarter Week V1

data.author: David Filskov

changelog.release_notes: Settings now available from the Pebble app.
On color Pebbles the letters Q and W is now dimmed.
Black background on older Pebbles works again.
Battery percentage when charging on Time now black instead of dark blue.
Blue background on top and bottom sections.
Unwated vibration in some cases removed.
Vibration at bluetooth state change now works again.

Invert colors by shaking your wrist at startup (x flashes). 
Bluetooth x fixed on Pebble Time - only shows when connection lost.
Fullly charged battery now says "100" instead of "10..."
Tiny adjustments to bluetooth and day's date positions.

- Date format now always four digits (e.g. 20/09 and 01/12) to keep its alignment.
- The day's date is now bold to better stand out.

- Battery now updates more often and inverts when charging.
- Text alignment adjusted slighty.
Now shows an x when bluetooth is lost (instead of inverted battery).

Horizontal lines re-added.
Battery only inverts when BT off/lost.
Month name now before date.

data.description:
Displays quarter, week number, battery percentage (inverted when charging), weekday, month name, date, 24h time and shows an x while bluetooth connection is off / lost and vibrates.

In its settings you can invert the colors and enable that shaking your wrist at startup will invert colors (while x blinks) on the fly.

Known bug: Settings page isn't working on iOS (only on Android) - we're looking into it.

Updates: We're considering a new "clean" mode (an option in Settings) where only the clock is shown and the date, week etc. are only visible for 5 seconds if you shake your wrist.


Design: David Filskov
Programming: Thor Muto Asmund

latest_release.release_notes: Settings now available from the Pebble app.

data.title: Quarter Week

data.author: leovander

changelog.release_notes: Aligned positioning of 12 and 6 hour hands with 0 and 30 mins.

- Updated to version 1.7
- Added options for inverting and larger font
- Switched persistent data to ints (1 or 0)
- Removed animations completely
- Saved changes reflected immediately
New version, gets rid of animation every minute. Only animation/transition on hour changes.
New UI for left hand side of watch. Memory bug free.
Changed error on 12 hour mark for 24 and 12 hour clocks.
Fixed issue with leading 0 in numbers less than 10.
Removed redundant code by having an hour of GRect's instead of two large switch statements.
Removed zero's in front of single digit hours.

data.description:
- Added Config screen
  - Option to invert background and text (Will be adding color options for Time)
  - Option for larger text

Suggestions? @theleovander
Concept submitted by /u/danilouis on reddit.

Based on one of my favorite games of all time, this is the Pebble Fighter watch face for all of you Street Fighter Fans!

data.author: Nev Rawlins

changelog.release_notes: Added support for Pebble 2 and Pebble Time 2.  Removed grey color selection on black and white screens as the numbers and edges did not look right.  Interactive configuration does not work with latest Pebble Clay, so removed this too.

Reworked configuration. Supports configuration when phone not connected to internet. If phone is connected to internet, then configuration changes show on watch interactively. On black and white Pebble screens, foreground & background can be set independently, with additional color for each: grey.
Corrected Aplite (black & white) problem where background color selected was not being restored when scrolling through watchfaces on Pebble.

data.description:
A digital watchface where the digits appear to be all tangled up, hence the name “Tangled”.  You can easily tell the time by reading the top two digits for hours, and the bottom two digits for minutes.  

This will appeal to those who appreciate a geometric display that is somewhat cryptic, yet actually very easy to read. 

Time will display in 12-hour or 24-hour mode, depending on the watch setting.

Using the configuration screen, it is possible to change both the background and time colors.  If same color is chosen for both, watchface converts foreground to black or white to ensure it still shows.
  
The screenshot examples show:  
 (1) 12:20 (cyan on dark blue) 
 (2) 12:03 (green on black)
 (3) 12:00 (lilac on black) 
 (4) 02:39 (white on black)
 (5) 21:59 (blue on white / 24-hour)


This watchface was designed by Heather Sable Villano and originally appear on the Tokyoflash Design Studio.  It is published with the designers’ permission, and sanctioned by Tokyoflash.   
  
The original design can be found here:  
http://blog.tokyoflash.com/2012/02/01/tangled-watch-design-gets-the-time-all-in-a-twist/

latest_release.release_notes: Added support for Pebble 2 and Pebble Time 2.  Removed grey color selection on black and white screens as the numbers and edges did not look right.  Interactive configuration does not work with latest Pebble Clay, so removed this too.

data.title: Tangled

data.author: Morris

changelog.release_notes:
Added config option to show heart rate for watches with HRM
Row option: Active time | Heart rate

- added support for Timeline Quick View
- added support for Pebble 2

new features:
* show Pebble Health data on PT,PTS,PTR (steps, distance, activity)
* show temperature | seconds
* new "heart" character
* new highlight options two/three columns (color Pebbles only)
* improved battery life by limiting accesses to the permanent storage

bugfixes:
* improved memory usage on Aplite to prevent a possible crash
Fixed some bugs with "Skip splash screen" and "No animation" options (thanks to Joseph for reporting this!)

* added option to display "Calendar week | seconds" row (second ticks are not animated but will drain your battery faster)
* prevent screen updates if the Watchface is not in focus

* Added Pebble Time Round support
* Fixed battery level percent display on rows showing Battery level | Calender week

new options:
* show battery level in percent
* hide the serif of the 5 to increase readability
* new row option: Calendar week | weekday number
* new row option: Empty row
* adjust the custom time zones to daylight saving time automatically

improvements:
* better temperature conversion to improve accuracy of Fahrenheit
* single color black/white highlight automatically invert the text as needed
* temperature is displayed in 3 digits if necessary and if there is enough room
* if the third temperature digit is truncated this is indicated in the hints display

bug fixes:
* a smooth gradient from and to the same color now works
* fixed boxed highlight inversion
Added option to show "Month | Short year" to complement "Weekday name | day" date format.

new options:
* use a larger font
* display time in two additional custom time zones
* override the time format set in the watch settings
* display date with weekday name or number
* display hints permanently
* new highlight options for Pebble Time (gradients and stripes using 3 colors)

improvements:
* more character options for the splash screen
* hide hints during animations
* don't invert black and white highlight colors

bugfixes:
* fixed crash occurring on original Pebbles during "Long animation" tapping effect

* Added more color highlight options (Pebble Time only)
* Added option to disable animations during a custom time period

* Added option to display Zulu time (UTC always in 24h format)
* Added option to display time in GMT (UTC in 12h/24h setting)
* Added longer double vibration option (Halfbeat)
* Added different invert option (everything, without highlight row, highlight row only)
* Added option to skip the splash screen at startup
* Added option to show the splash screen when tapping the watch
* Added SPACE as a valid character to display on the splash screen
* Added option to disable animation when BT is disconnected

* Only vibrate once to indicate BT disconnect instead of on every start.
* Vibrate for reconnection even if the Watchface was not active when the reconnect occurred
* Added option to show temperature in Celsius and Fahrenheit next to each other in one line

* Added options:
  - Vibrate on BT re-connect
  - Configure every vibration type (short, long, double, heartbeat)
  - Longer animation on tapping the watch
  - Invert the screen (permanently or on BT connection loss)
  - Track the Pebble Appstore Hearts of a Pebble App or Watchface
  - Configure the animation style (ease in, ease out, ease in and out, linear)
  - Enable a "No vibration" schedule
  - Disable all vibrations while charging
* Some extended options are only shown on request on the configuration page
* Performance and memory usage improvements on monochrome Pebbles
* Some minor bug fixes
Added workaround for JavaScript exception in 3.0 firmware.

* Made temperature update and caching intervals configurable
* Improvements on temperature update mechanism
Added more options to limit animations (disabled except for startup and/or tapping animation)

* Fixed Watchface running amok and crashing when all rows are set to random [who does that anyway? ;)]
* Fixed screen not returning to normal after scrambling when animations are disabled
* Added tapping effect: Animation
* Added monochrome highlight option: Dark Gray

* Improved performance on monochrome Pebbles
* Changed display of temperatures in Fahrenheit (it's now the same as for Celsius, always 2 digits except for temps < -9)
Fixed issue with settings page not opening on iPhones.

data.description:
Inspired by the Enigma Watchface shown during the Pebble Time Kickstarter campaign, I created my own version and added some twists of my own and lots of customization options. Works on Pebbles with color and monochrome displays.

All credit for the original design to the designer and the developer of the Enigma Watchface, Alex Kirov and Neal Patel.

Configurable options:
* Font size
* Highlight colors and style
* Invert the screen
* Five lines of data
* Splash screen
* Choose from:
  - Time (local and custom time zones)
  - Date
  - Random digits
  - Temperature (provided by OpenWeatherMap.org)
  - Watch battery level
  - Calendar week
  - Splash screen string
  - Pebble Appstore Hearts (provided by PblWeb.com)
  - Seconds
  - Pebble Health data
* Limit animations to conserve battery life
* Animation speed and style
* Tapping effects: Scramble, Display help, Animations, Show splash screen
* Display help permanently
* Time and Date format
* Temperature unit
* Fixed weather location or GPS
* Temperature update intervals
* Bluetooth connection loss and reconnection alert
* Low battery level alert
* Hourly vibration
* No vibration while charging
* No vibration/animation schedule
* Different vibration patterns

Please contact me for bug reports, questions or feature requests.

Please remember to "heart" the Watchface if you like it. Thanks!

Added config option to show heart rate for watches with HRM
Row option: Active time | Heart rate

data.description:
Do you want to never be late to an appointment again?

Schrodinger's Watch lets you know the time and not know the time all at once. Every minute, this watch face adds 1 - 10 minutes to the clock so you always have time left over.

Based on the visual aesthetics of "The Modern Gentleman" - this watch face is an elegant solution to time management.

data.author: Chris Eilander
data.description:
Show your love for the Spreading Excitement all Over the World with Suzumiya Haruhi Brigade (SOS brigade for short) with this simple Watchface. It even has a little picture of your Brigade leader on it.

data.author: Turner Yey

changelog.release_notes: Tweaked the appearance on Pebble Time 2 a little and added a Quiet Time icon.
Made hands less likely to overlap the date.
Added option to turn off bluetooth vibration after midnight.
Removed the ball at the end of the second hand
Added support for gesture activated backlight by Matthew Hungerford which you can turn on in settings.
Allow font size to be increased in settings.
The second hand has a counterweight.
changed date font and added hourly vibration

data.description:
Really simple watch design that animates when you go back to it from the timeline.

You can change the color of every part of the watch in the settings page.

The second hand is hidden by default to maximize battery life, but you can turn it on in settings.

When bluetooth connection is lost, the watch vibrates and shows the bluetooth icon.

When battery is under 30% a low battery icon appears on the top right.

When quiet time is on, a speaker icon appears on the left.

Hourly vibrate (with per hour pattern) can be turned on by specifying a time range in apple settings.

Other optional settings:

Show/Hide date and week.
Increase date size.
Turn on backlight with casual arm gesture (by Matt Hungerford).

Donations welcome: http://www.paypal.me/terryyuen/1usd
data.title: TH3

data.author: Gian-Luca Mateo

changelog.release_notes: -Granting a popular request: Date uses a larger Font
1.3: Tried local compilation instead of CloudPebble - maybe this solves installation issues for aplite

1.2: 
-Added support for OG Pebbles (Pebble and Pebble Steel)!
-Reduces draw call frequency (makes your battery happy)
-Small Bugfixes and improvements

data.description:
A beautifully simple yet clever analogue watch.

Things it does:
-Show you the time
-Show minute markers only where relevant
-Indicate lost Bluetooth connection
-Reduce second hand refresh interval to 15 seconds below 30% battery
-Give you a remaining battery life estimate when battery gets low

Things it doesn't do (yet?):
-Flashy animations
-Weather info
-Make you coffee

Colorcodes for second hand:
-Red: Battery low
-Blue: Bluetooth connection lost
-Cyan: Battery charging
-Green: Battery charged
data.title: Simple.Watch

From the MegaMan Battle Network series for the Game Boy Advance, comes the NetNavi! Ever wanted to have your own? Turn your Pebble into a PET and bring MegaMan.EXE, or your favorite NetNavi*, to your wrist! Displays time and temperature. Only for Pebble Time.

*Others to be added in later updates...


All images, and the name MegaMan are owned by Capcom. Game Boy Advance is owned by Nintendo. I make no claim in owning these properties.

data.author: Pete Stoppani

changelog.release_notes: Fixed Pebble 2 issues (crashes, premium key, heart rate display)

Fixed word wrap for long station/city names.
Added heart rate display for Pebble 2.

+ Pebble 4.0 support
+ Health data display options
+ Premium option to have filled or outlined watch hands
One more tweak to purchase key entry.

Added ability to specify location for Weather Underground.

Fixed German day abbreviations
Fixed: "shake" and "large text" only worked as Premium features even though they are not.
Fixed multibyte language and font issues.
Fixed: Week day name too long for Large Text and certain face layouts

Added:
- Option to turn weather updates
- 3 new face colors
- 3 new hand colors

Fixed:
- Put back 3 character weekday names for English
Added option for larger text size.
Corrected Russian days of the week abbreviations (thanks Vitaliy B :)

Added:
- Russian language (requires you to create a custom watch firmware using www.pebblebits.com)

Fixed:
- Remembers last known GPS location so you can turn off location services after acquiring weather info)

Added:
- Option to select shake/tap behavior
- Option to enable diagnostics mode for customer service

Fixed:
- Improved weather updates
- Reduced memory usage
Fixed:  Date displayed using local timezone.
For color Pebble Time watches, added the ability to select the time zone for the digital display.

data.description:
Analog/Digital watch with weather and health data summary, and forecast, with two shakes of the wrist.  

Get 1000's of custom watch face combinations with:
 - 8 display options 
 - 9 watch faces 
 - 9 watch hand styles
 - 9 watch face colors (Premium Feature)
 - 9 watch hand colors (Premium Feature)
 - 15 background textures (Premium Feature)
 - Filled or outlined hands (Premium Feature)

Additional Premium Features:
 - Weather Underground data that is much more accurate than the free Open Weather
 - Second timezone
 - Language
 - Bluetooth disconnect alert
 - Low battery alert
 - Hourly vibe
 - Do not disturb

data.description:
Japanese version of Fuzzy Time.
When it runs on Pebble Time, text color will be changed according to battery status.

0 to 10%:red
11 to 30%:yellow
31 to 100%:green

Also charging icon is shown at upper right corner during battery charging.
With tapping ,you can see current time in digital format between five seconds.

--- Followings are Japanese ---

Fuzzy Timeの日本語バージョンです。
Pebble Timeで動作させた場合、バッテリー残量に応じて文字色が変わります。

0～10%：赤
11～30%：黄
31～100%：緑

また、充電中は右上にアイコンが表示されます。
タップするとデジタル時計が5秒間表示されます。
data.title: Japanese Fuzzy Time

data.author: MMazzocchi
data.description:
It's back! The Life Level watchface is now in color!

This face shows the battery level of the watch in the hearts displayed. Hook up a charging cable and watch the hearts refill!

The seasons in the back change with the month. Changes are roughly on equinoxes and solsitices (+/- 1 day).

There is a black and white version of this face; unfortunately I haven't yet packaged it with the color one. It's still available though; check "More from this developer".

The Legend of Zelda games, screenshots, and copyrights belong to Nintendo.

data.description:
An easy Pebble smart watch app face, which displays the current city name along the time.

Useful if you commute in the night.

Features:

- 24 hour clock
- updates every 15 minutes
- updates on shake
- displaying of update status
- uses OpenStreetMaps API to get the city/town/village name
- vibrates twice when the city name changes

Requires GPS on the phone.
